title: 服务器问题
author: 299uipHjk
txt_content:
本帖最后由 299uipHjk 于 2012-10-12 20:56 编辑 

服务器运行不了怎么回事
运行时显示**** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
server.log如下：


2012-10-09 18:42:35 [INFO] Starting minecraft server version 1.2.32012-10-09 18:42:35 [INFO] Loading properties
2012-10-09 18:42:35 [INFO] Starting Minecraft server on *:25565
2012-10-09 18:42:35 [WARNING] **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
2012-10-09 18:42:35 [WARNING] The exception was: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind
2012-10-09 18:42:35 [WARNING] Perhaps a server is already running on that port?
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE] java.lang.NullPointerException
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.b(MinecraftServer.java:594)
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:458)
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:490)
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE] Unexpected exception
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.b(MinecraftServer.java:594)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:458)
        at net.minecraft.server.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:490)
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [INFO] Stopping server
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE] java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE]         at java.util.ArrayList.RangeCheck(Unknown Source)
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE]         at java.util.ArrayList.get(Unknown Source)
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.stop(MinecraftServer.java:411)
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:482)
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:490)
2012-10-09 18:42:36 [INFO] Stopping server


问题已解决

replies.author: ustedy
replies.txt_content:
①server properties中的“server-ip=”一项填入错误，此处应该填入你的IP，路由器用户填内网IP，否则填外网IP；
　　②server properties中的“server-port=”一项填入错误，路由器用户请输入你的本机映射端口否则留空（外网用户可以选择性地设置端口，无需映射，在“server-port=”处输入端口号即可）；
　　 ③你同时开启了多个服务器，却使用同一个IP或端口，关闭服务器并添加或更改服务器的端口后，重启服务器即可.

replies.author: 好人就是好
replies.txt_content: 解决的方法不清楚       你应该是用了 映射的ip吧

replies.txt_content:
